trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded"> </xref> evento di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>evento si verifica solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>proprietà è impostata o dai relativi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state.
trans-unit.target: La gestione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>evento è utile quando si desidera determinare l'errore per una cella in base allo stato o al valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Quando si gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>evento e si specifica il testo di errore nel gestore, viene visualizzata un'icona di errore nella cella, a meno che il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è impostata su `false` o la cella è in modalità di modifica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente sposta il puntatore del mouse sull'icona di errore, il testo di errore viene visualizzato in una descrizione comando.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>evento si verifica anche ogni volta che il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà viene recuperata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>proprietà per determinare lo stato o il valore di una cella e utilizzare queste informazioni per modificare o cambiare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene inizializzata con il valore della cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>proprietà, che sostituisce il valore dell'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>evento quando si lavora con grandi quantità di dati, per evitare il calo delle prestazioni dell'impostazione del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>valore per più celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedure consigliate per ridimensionare il controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message that is displayed when the cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il messaggio che viene visualizzato quando si seleziona la cella.

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a row.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà contiene inizialmente il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà se è stata impostata per una riga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ErrorText property value displays as a ToolTip for the error glyph in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà ErrorText Visualizza come descrizione comando per l'icona di errore della cella.
